programme.desc: Vijay's father is brutally killed by villagers after being framed. His family is forced to flee. Vijay vows revenge and becomes a gangster himself

programme.title: The Waiting Room
programme.desc: Four passengers are stranded on a rainy night at a remote railway station. A serial killer is on the prowl at the waiting room creating panic. Will they nab the killer before it's too late?

programme.title: Bal Ganesh 2
programme.desc: The animated movie takes the audience back to the time when Ganesh was a young boy, a mischievous one at that

programme.title: Patiala House
programme.desc: Playing Cricket is Parghat's dream. But, will his father's past come in his way, or will he live out this dream?

programme.title: Shaan
programme.desc: DCP Shiv Kumar, an honest police officer, lives with his family and two brothers, who are conmen. During a case, Shiv Kumar gets killed and the two brothers avenge their brother's death

programme.title: Atithi Tum Kab Jaoge?
programme.desc: Chachaji turns up unannounced at Puneet and Munmun's home. He overstays. The angry couple comes up with various ploys to hasten his departure

programme.title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
programme.desc: Anjali is very friendly with Rahul. Rahul falls in love with Tina and marries her. This breaks Anjali's heart and she decides to settle far away

programme.title: Dabangg 2
programme.desc: Inspector Chulbul Pandey is transferred to Kanpur. He disrupts Baccha Bhaiyaa's political image by revealing his immoral actions to the public

programme.title: Pink
programme.desc: After being molested, Minal along with her friends tries to file an FIR against a politician's nephew. When the subsequent case gets rigged, Deepak, a retired lawyer, helps them to fight the case

programme.title: Shola Aur Shabnam
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Kali's brother Bali, wants to marry Divya by hook or by crook. But Divya is in love with Karan, who she plans to marry. Will Bali's desire to marry Divya be fulfilled?

programme.title: Sikandar
programme.desc: The movie shows how Sikandar becomes a victim in a game played out between the militants, the army, the politicians and religious heads of Kashmir

programme.title: The Front Row With Anupama Chopra
programme.desc: Watch Anupama Chopra as she reviews the latest in Bollywood and Hollywood. (S1, E48)

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: Noted for its fresh and witty appeal, the show is hosted by Karan Johar where celebrities are interviewed in the show's trademark informal style. (S3, E5)

programme.title: Andaz
programme.desc: Sheetal, a widow, is a school teacher and lives with his son after her husband's death. She meets her student's father Ravi, a widower, and decides to marry him

programme.title: Son of Sardaar
programme.desc: Returning to his parents' village, a man becomes the latest target in a long-standing family feud

programme.title: Kabali
programme.desc: Kabali fights against the oppression faced by the Tamils working in Malaysia as labourers. However, he is jailed for twenty-five years and once released; he sets out to seek his revenge

programme.title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
programme.desc: Rohit and Naina are sweethearts and hope to marry soon. Aman too falls in love with Naina. How will the drama unfold?

programme.title: Singham
programme.desc: Rakesh Kadam, an honest police officer in Goa, commits suicide because of false accusations of corruption by Jaikant Shikre. Will Kadam's wife Megha be able to seek revenge against Shikre?

programme.title: Partner
programme.desc: A 'Love Guru' assists other males, woos a widowed single mother, but becomes embroiled in controversies

programme.title: Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey
programme.desc: Deprived of playing football by the oppressive British, children decide to join a group of freedom fighters(n)

programme.title: Koffee With Karan
programme.desc: Noted for its fresh and witty appeal, the show is hosted by Karan Johar where celebrities are interviewed in the show's trademark informal style. (S3, E9)(n)

programme.title: Zakhm
programme.desc: Amidst religious riots, a Hindu son deals with his Muslim mother's last request to bury her according to her faith when she dies. Will he fulfill his mother's last request?(n)

programme.title: Bobby Jasoos
programme.desc: Bobby Jasoos starring Vidya Balan, is a film that celebrates the aspiration of Bobby, who wants to become the number one detective in the old city area of Hyderabad.(n)

programme.title: Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna
programme.desc: Dev and Maya are married, but not to each other. A chance encounter brings them together and they feel a strange attraction that soon develops into a close friendship. Watch the drama unfold(n)

programme.title: Dhol
programme.desc: Four friends set out in their individual plans to marry wealthy Ritu and get rich without working hard but end up discovering a spine-chilling truth. Watch this comedy film starring Sharman Joshi(n)

programme.title: Golmaal 3
programme.desc: In Goa, Pritam meets his love Geeta after many years. Dabbu decides to have a marriage for them but will their kids live as one family?(n)

programme.title: Baby
programme.desc: A counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists and prevent them from striking at the heart of India(n)

programme.title: Hijack
programme.desc: Vikram is informed that his daughter's flight has been hijacked by terrorists, who want the Indian government to release one of their comrades. Will Vikram succeed in rescuing his daughter, Priya?(n)
